recommended_degree: Teknologi Informasi, Ilmu Komputer, Pemeliharaan Komputer dan Jaringan, Sistem Komputer (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
* Assist in setting up new computers, including installing operating systems, required applications, and initial configurations under supervision.
* Help troubleshoot basic hardware issues such as keyboard, mouse, monitor, or connectivity problems.
* Support software-related troubleshooting, including installation errors, application crashes, or login issues.
* Check and report network connection status (Wi-Fi, LAN) and escalate issues to the IT staff when needed.
* Perform routine checks on IT equipment (printers, scanners, access points) and report any irregularities.
* Assist in organizing and updating IT inventory data, including listing serial numbers, device conditions, and assigning labels.
* Help prepare simple documentation such as guides, checklists, and records of IT support activities.
* Assist with weekly system updates or basic maintenance tasks following instructions from IT staff.
* Provide support during IT-related events (e.g., classroom setup, meeting room equipment, or online presentation tools).
* Follow all IT procedures related to data privacy, system access, and equipment handling.
